channel.title: [317] [NOT PI]Emotion Timer[NOT PI] [317]
channel.description:
I am not really sure how I would search for something like this.
Basically, on the server you can mass click the emotions and that causes my server to lag horribly. I was wondering if someone knew a link to a tut on how to add a timer so you can do emotions every like five seconds?
